statements: SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight'
SELECT name, country FROM Boxers WHERE wins > 10
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT name, wins, losses FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Featherweight' AND wins < losses
SELECT boxer_id, name, country FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class IN ('Featherweight', 'Heavyweight')
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE wins > 10 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, country FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight' OR weight_class = 'Lightweight'
SELECT name, country, wins FROM Boxers WHERE country = 'USA' AND (wins > 15 OR losses < 5)
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' LIMIT 5
SELECT boxer_id, name, weight_class, country, wins FROM Boxers WHERE losses = 0 ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class='Heavyweight';
SELECT name, age FROM Boxers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT boxer_id, name, age FROM Boxers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tournament WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tournament_name, location, prize_money FROM Tournament WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY weight_class ASC
SELECT name, weight_class, country FROM Boxers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT boxer_id, name, age, country FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 30
SELECT * FROM Tournament WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-08-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, location, prize_money FROM Tournament WHERE prize_money > 5000 ORDER BY prize_money DESC
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT boxer_name, age, country FROM Boxers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT boxer_name, wins, losses FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight';
SELECT * FROM Tournaments WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT tournament_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM Tournaments ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class, age FROM Boxers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, location, start_date FROM Tournaments WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT boxer_name, wins, losses FROM Boxers ORDER BY wins DESC;

SELECT Matches.match_id, Tournaments.tournament_name, Boxers.boxer_name AS boxer1, Matches.match_date FROM Matches JOIN Tournaments ON Matches.tournament_id = Tournaments.tournament_id JOIN Boxers ON Matches.boxer1_id = Boxers.boxer_id;
SELECT * FROM boxers;
SELECT full_name, nationality FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT tournament_id, name, location, start_date FROM tournaments WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT full_name AS boxer_name, nationality AS country, weight_class AS class FROM boxers WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT full_name, weight_class FROM boxers WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight' ORDER BY full_name DESC;

SELECT b.full_name, t.name, m.match_date FROM boxers b JOIN matches m ON b.boxer_id = m.boxer1_id JOIN tournaments t ON m.tournament_id = t.tournament_id WHERE b.weight_class = 'Featherweight' AND m.match_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY m.match_date ASC;
SELECT t.name AS tournament_name, COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM matches m JOIN tournaments t ON m.tournament_id = t.tournament_id GROUP BY t.name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_matches DESC;

SELECT r.full_name AS referee_name, t.name AS tournament_name FROM referees r, tournaments t, matches m WHERE r.referee_id = m.winner_id AND m.tournament_id = t.tournament_id ORDER BY t.name, r.full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT boxer_id, boxer_name, weight_class FROM Boxers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tournaments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT boxer_name, country FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT match_id, boxer1_id, boxer2_id, winner_id, match_date FROM Matches WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Boxers
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tournaments
SELECT match_id, match_date, winner_id FROM Matches ORDER BY match_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Judges WHERE nationality = 'USA'
SELECT boxer_name, weight_class, age FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight'
